medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain, epigastric and right upper quadrant (RUQ).
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain present for several weeks; initially thought to be due to constipation, but no relief after drinking 3 bottles of magnesium citrate and having multiple bowel movements over the weekend.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Irritable Bowel Syndrome, Peptic Ulcer Disease, Hemorrhoids, Sleep Apnea, Essential Hypertension, Benign Hypercholesterolemia, Tobacco Dependence, Type 2 Diabetes, Lumbar Degenerative Disc Disease.
